com.sun.identity.wss.security

Class KerberosTokenSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.identity.wss.security.KerberosTokenSpec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SecurityTokenSpec

    public class KerberosTokenSpec
extends Object
implements SecurityTokenSpec
    This class represents Kerberos Security Token Specification. It implements SecurityTokenSpec interface.
